category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 26 (Obligations of officers and employees in performing duties)
contents: Article 26 (Obligations of officers and employees in performing their duties) ① When performing their duties, officers and employees must comply with laws and regulations and perform them faithfully in good faith. Revised on January 5, 2022, ② Executives and employees must not divulge other people's confidential information that they have learned in the course of their duties., ③ Executives and employees must not disclose personal information that they have learned in the course of their duties, process it without authority, or allow others to use it. It must not be used for unfair purposes, such as providing information.
